# About Signatures

## The Attestation key

- Bit length: 2048
- e: 0x03 (3)
- N:  ()
- d:  ()
- Prime1: 00dd9c2ec64640c94113e26eac9b4863462fc7e692408533aba7c1121c92990db6c2b5151a6f070924f7784a0f48013885edbe997fdbbd2eb74b8c64c1f46407013ee4a33393a2622c990dcd2c07fd017c72b9244434dc82d9fa26e97657cacc75dba5d89e83eb9f37e152c0325fc18adbc75031d121a936e11c7d47266bda80f9
- Prime2: 00dcb1e80b34df77c848f3de08d232be1f0d79cd2f683122f15146b74bd90ef9316f41479bf4051646be53feaf4bcdb511df7448e827c26c28128f09196627da206f25ebf4ef34e43fb4e805ccbd30bf13e636294eb3b1f1f0b9e5a7a1488d0cbff5b69800bcc0b73dabc135d3539f60c446bb4ecc55934dddffe5de4f9eddd661

## Useful links and tools

- Manually check keys and do RSA operations: https://www.mobilefish.com/services/rsa_key_generation/rsa_key_generation.php
- Solidity Library for RSA Verification (might be outdated): https://github.com/adria0/SolRsaVerify
- Explains steps done by openssl sign: https://medium.com/@bn121rajesh/rsa-sign-and-verify-using-openssl-behind-the-scene-bf3cac0aade2

## Useful commands

- Generate private key: openssl genrsa -3 -out attestationPrivateKey.pem 2048
- Derive public key: openssl rsa -in attestationPrivateKey.pem -outform PEM -pubout -out public.pem
- Display key information: openssl rsa -in attestationPrivateKey.pem -text
- Write hex to be encoded into .tex-file (Cannot be displayed as it is no ASCII encoding):  perl -e 'print pack "H*", "<hex-string>"' > toBeSignedTxt/attestationStringPartyX.txt
- Sign .tex-file and write it to signature file: openssl dgst -sha256 -sign attestationPrivateKey.pem -out signatures/signatureX.sign toBeSignedTxt/attestationStringPartyX.txt
- Display signature as hex string: xxd -p signatures/signatureX.sign | tr -d \\n

## Useful scripts

- Write the byte arrays that are to be signed to files toBeSignedTxt/attestationStringParty<i>.txt
  - The byte arrays are hard coded
- Sign the byte arrays that are written to to files toBeSignedTxt/attestationStringParty<i>.txt and write the result to toBeSignedTxt/attestationStringParty<i>.txt (For i in [0,9])
- Print the signatures of files toBeSignedTxt/attestationStringParty<i>.txt (For i in [0,9]) to console

Encoded Messages
==================

- = abi.encodePacked("Pose-Attest" || hash(Enclave-Program) || Enclave Ethereum Address || Enclave Encryption Key)
- with hash(Enclave-Program) = 0x0a28e9ffef0073f9a6a674cf57ee77307f38f0f1bebb087888d9011ed0eeefdf
- and Enclave Encryption Key = 0x4242424242424242424242424242424242424242424242424242424242424242
